document_data.name: Angram Baergil
document_data.mainbody: '''Angram Baergil''' (? â€“ 1333 DR) was a farmer who part-owned a farm near to [[Ashabenford]], [[Mistledale]]. He was the father of famous Captain [[Darrask Baergil]] of the [[Riders of Mistledale]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2011)/Captain Baergil}}
document_data.Relatives: Angram was married to [[Baelaetha Baergil]], and they had seven children: three boys and four girls. His first two sons were [[Athror Baergil]] and Captain Darrask Baergil.
document_data.Death: Angram died in [[1333 DR]], from a winter fever.
